Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Waterfront Way, between two small shopping centers.
Room.LongDescription: The large building on the south houses three small shops. The door on the south reads "Eye of the Dragon Fine Gems" in glittering platinum. There are two more doors to the west along Waterfront Way. On the north side of the road is another building. A large golden sign with a mean looking red dragon appears to say "DRAGONWARES". The massive metal door to the north is an entrance into this strange shop.
